## BatchOperationsService.batchDemote() method

Demotes a batch of items. This operation returns an instance of 'BatchOperationCreationResult' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static batchDemote({ requestModel, }: {
        requestModel: BatchPromoteDemoteRequest;
    }): CancelablePromise<BatchOperationCreationResult>;
```
